explains: n. 维护和平；停火协议的执行

sentences.en: Peacekeeping, by its nature, makes pre-planning difficult.
sentences.cn: 维和行动本质上很难预先计划。

sentences.en: British forces have been assigned to help with peacekeeping.
sentences.cn: 英国军队被派遣协助维持和平。

sentences.en: The road is nominally under the control of UN peacekeeping troops.
sentences.cn: 那条路名义上是在联合国维和部队的控制之下。
